sentences.english: Without Boone the history of Kentucky would have been much different.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有布恩，肯塔基的歷史將會是另外一副模樣。

sentences.english: A matronly head appeared around a door.
sentences.chinese: 一個主管模樣的人出現在門口。

sentences.english: Nick giggled;the first exprression of mirth he had exhibited.
sentences.chinese: 尼克喫喫地笑了，他第一次顯出開心的模樣。

sentences.english: In Tokyo window cleaners dress up as the animals of the Chinese zodiac.
sentences.chinese: 在東京，窗戶清潔工們打扮成了中國十二生肖的模樣。

sentences.english: So Lynx went around to the other side of the lake and turned into a deer.
sentences.chinese: 於是猞猁跑到湖的另一邊變成了鹿的模樣。

sentences.english: It is the Holy Spirit’s job to produce Christlike character in you.
sentences.chinese: 把你創造成耶穌的模樣，這就是聖靈的工作。

sentences.english: She seized a hand-mirror and looked at herself.
sentences.chinese: 她抓起一柄手鏡照自己的模樣。

sentences.english: The shape and form are there. You have only to refine the work.
sentences.chinese: 現在形態和模樣都有了，你需要做的只是精雕細琢。

sentences.english: It could be anyone from an animal to a bad person.
sentences.chinese: 這個壞傢伙可能是任何模樣，從動物到壞人。

sentences.english: The third time Monkey came for the fan he decided to turn himself into the Bull Demon King.
sentences.chinese: 第三次，悟空變成牛魔王模樣，騙得真扇。

sentences.english: I pretend to be a human through Linguini.
sentences.chinese: 而在小林面前，我又得裝出一副人的模樣。

sentences.english: This is what the energy level diagram looks like.
sentences.chinese: 這就是能量級圖表大致的模樣。

sentences.english: The deformations (deflection value) of the patterns with different coatings were measured under different loads.
sentences.chinese: 測試塗掛不同塗料的模樣在變載荷下的撓度值。

sentences.english: Noboby could, not with a mousy little person like Melanie.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人會愛上象梅拉妮那樣的小耗子模樣。

sentences.english: For such are false apostles, deceitful workers, transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 那等人是假使徒，行事詭詐，裝作基督使徒的模樣。

definition: scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
to change into/to turn into/to become
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
